Vehicle Type.description: Vehicle type; should be one of SUV, Truck, Sedan, Crossover

Fuel Type.description: Vehicle fuel type; should be one of gas, electric, hybrid

Vehicle Launch.description: Whether this is a new vehicle type; Y or N

Offer Cash Back.description: If there is a cash allowance offer on the vehicle, how much ($)

Offer Loan APR.description: If there is a loan offer on the vehicle, what is the APR being offered (%)

Offer Loan Monthly.description: If there is a loan offer on the vehicle, what is the monthly payment ($)

Offer Loan Down.description: If there is a loan offer on the vehicle, how much down payment is required ($)

Offer Loan # Months.description: If there is a loan offer on the vehicle, how many months

Offer Lease.description: If there is a lease offer for the vehicle, what is the monthly lease amount ($)

Offer Lease Down.description: If there is a lease offer for the vehicle, how much down payment is required ($)

Offer Lease Months.description: If there is a lease offer on the vehicle, how many months.

Offer Service.description: If there is a a promotional offer for auto maintenance or repair service, including oil, tire rotation, brakes, tire replacement, tune up, what is the text of that offer.

Offer Type.description: If there is a a promotional offer for auto maintenance or repair service, is it one of (cash rebate | discount | free merchandise | free service).

Offer Amount.description: If there is a a promotional offer for auto maintenance or repair service, what is the amount of that offer.

Offer Expiration.description: If there is a a promotional offer for auto maintenance or repair service, when does it expire.

Offer Issuer.description: The vehicle manufacturer if this ad is for vehicle sales.  This should be the service center if ad is for verhicle service like oil or tire service.

Offer Close.description: If there is any offer, what date does it end.
